column12: Number of performance rates to be included in the XML
column13: Indicate an Overall Performance Rate if more than 1 performance rate is to be submitted Specify which rate will represent an overall performance rate for the measure or how an overall performance rate could be calculated based on the data submitted in the XML [for example, simple average of the performance rates submitted or weighted average (sum the numerators divided by the sum of the denominators), etc].
